source.title: Scientists 3D Printed Ears Inside Living Mice Using Light

exampleSentences.sentence: Within 20 seconds, the team was able to generate the basic shape of a human ear on a living mouse, with the ear-like shape maintaining its sophisticated structure for at least a month.
They kept the mice awake for up to five days in a cage with a rotating bar that gently pushed the animals to make them move.
